channel.title: "On a Rail" securty gate guard non-responsive.
channel.description:
Hello, I discovered a glitch where if you quicksave while the guard who opens the little tram barrier is finished talking, but hasn't opened the gate let, and then quit, when you come back he'll be nonresponsive and he won't open the gate until you load your last autosave.
Nothing too game breaking, but it just seems like a little thing that could break immersion or something like that if someone just happens to quicksave there.
Note: I've only experienced this once, and haven't attempted to reproduce the bug. Would probably still happen though.
